name: Swinford Park
description: A historic park in downtown La Ceiba with gardens, monuments, and relaxation areas.
details: Open daily: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM | Free entrance | Great for families and picnics.

name: Cayos Cochinos
address: Caribbean Sea off the coast of La Ceiba
description: A group of protected virgin islands, perfect for diving and ecotourism.
details: Access via boat tour | Price: $60 per person | Guided snorkeling and hiking tours available.

name: Pico Bonito
address: Yaruca Road, Pico Bonito National Park
description: National park with trails, waterfalls, hanging bridges, and rich biodiversity.
details: Entry fee: $10 | Open 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM | Guided tours available | Bring hiking shoes.

name: Cabotage Dock
description: Historic dock used for trade and fishing. An iconic spot in the city.
details: Open to public | Best time to visit: sunset | No entrance fee | Local fish markets nearby.

name: Ceibe√±o Boardwalk
description: A seaside promenade with beautiful views, restaurants, and outdoor activities.
details: Restaurants open until 10 PM | Free access | Live music on weekends.

name: Zacate River Waterfalls
description: Beautiful waterfalls surrounded by tropical vegetation, perfect for hiking and photography.
details: Entry: $5 | Best season: rainy | Access via trail (moderate difficulty) | Bring water shoes.

name: Municipal Museum
description: A small museum with cultural, historical artifacts and exhibits from the city.
details: Admission: $3 | Hours: Mon-Fri 9 AM - 4 PM | Guided tours available in Spanish.
